Name: Natural musical talent/good ear for music (1 -very poor; 5 - very good)
Ability to sight-read music (1 -very poor; 5 - very good)
Ability to repeat musical lines after hearing them (1 -very poor; 5 - very good)
Ability to hear the baseline in a piece (1 - very poor; 5 - very good)
Ability to hear the individual components in chords (1 -very poor; 5 - very good)
Harmonizing with others (1 - very difficult; 5 - very easy)
Hearing out individual instruments when listening to an orchestra/ensemble (1 - very difficult; 5 - very easy)
Detecting if an instrument or singer is out of tune (i.e. too flat or sharp) (1 - very difficult; 5 - very easy)
